name: df-msa
body: |- wceq(cmsa, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cfv(cm0s, cv(s1)), cfv(cmax, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(cmvt, cv(s0))), wfun(cres(ccnv(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mSA =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(mEx ` s0)|((m0St ` s1)‚àà(mAx ` s0)‚àß(1st ` s1)‚àà(mVT ` s0)‚àß Fun((`'(2nd ` s1)|`(mVR ` s0))))})
